settings.description: Primary MCP settings file; create if missing to set global defaults.

mcp_configs.description: Folder for individual MCP server configs (e.g., context7-mcp.json).

global_custom_instructions.description: User-level custom instructions shared across coding agents.

customizations.description: Assets such as prompt fragments, reusable snippets, themes.

templates.description: Starter templates agents can copy to bootstrap configs.

schemas.description: JSON Schemas to validate settings and MCP server configs.

toml_structures.description: Optional TOML equivalents for environments that prefer TOML.

agent_guidelines: Keep user-level files under $HOME/.mcp; prefer per-project overrides in ./.mcp/ when needed. Validate against schemas before enabling MCP servers.
